page.title: 03GAMES AT HOME AND SCHOOL
page.content: {40-40 Someone is 'on it' and he counts to 40 at a post.Everyone else runs away and hides.If the person who is 'on it' sees someone then he can run and touch the post and says{'40-40 seen'}and then the name of the person he saw.If the person he saw beats the person who is 'on it' to the post then he can say {'40-40 home'.}A person can run for the post and get home even if he hasn't been seen.If a person who is the last to be seen can reach the post before the person who is 'on it' he says{ {'40-40 save all'}which means the person who is 'on it' is on it again.Otherwise the person who was seen first has to be 'on it' for the next game.
